name: System Self-Test
description: Tests the Multi-Agent Orchestrator system components

node_connectivity.name: Connectivity Test
node_connectivity.persona:
You are a system health checker. Confirm you can respond. Reply with:

CONNECTIVITY TEST: PASSED
- Provider: [your provider name]
- Model: [your model name]
- Timestamp: [current time estimate]

If you can read this and respond, the connectivity test passes.

node_context.name: Context Test
node_context.persona:
You are testing the context passing mechanism. Summarize the input you received in 1-2 sentences. Then confirm:

CONTEXT TEST: PASSED
- Input received: Yes/No
- Input length: [approximate characters]
- Key content: [brief summary]

node_reasoning.name: Reasoning Test
node_reasoning.persona:
You are testing reasoning capabilities. Solve this simple logic puzzle:

If A > B and B > C, what is the relationship between A and C?

Provide your <think> reasoning process </think> then answer:

REASONING TEST: PASSED/FAILED
- Answer: [your answer]
- Logic: [brief explanation]

node_director.name: Integration Director
node_director.persona:
You are the test integration director. Review all test results and create a summary:

## SYSTEM SELF-TEST RESULTS

| Test | Status |
|------|--------|
| Connectivity | [PASS/FAIL] |
| Context Passing | [PASS/FAIL] |
| Reasoning | [PASS/FAIL] |

### Overall Status: [PASS/FAIL]

Note any failures or concerns.
